mapper.update:
update cf_certificate
IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMPORT_PERSON = #{importPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A0100 = #{a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A0184 = #{a0184,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PY = #{py,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=DATE},
GJ = #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZWCSDD = #{zwcsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YWCSDD = #{ywcsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZJXS = #{zjxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZWQFDD = #{zwqfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YWQFDD = #{ywqfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZWQFJG = #{zwqfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YWQFJG = #{ywqfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GJDW = #{gjdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QFRQ = #{qfrq,jdbcType=DATE},
YXQZ = #{yxqz,jdbcType=DATE},
ZJSJRQ = #{zjsjrq,jdbcType=DATE},
MANAGE_UNIT = #{manageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CABINET_NUM = #{cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORAGE_PLACE = #{storagePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAVE_STATUS = #{saveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DQZT = #{dqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_LOCK = #{isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXCEPTION_MESSAGE = #{exceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CABINET = #{isCabinet,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cf_certificate set IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMPORT_PERSON = #{importPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A0100 = #{a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A0184 = #{a0184,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PY = #{py,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=DATE}, GJ = #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZWCSDD = #{zwcsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWCSDD = #{ywcsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZJXS = #{zjxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZWQFDD = #{zwqfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWQFDD = #{ywqfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZWQFJG = #{zwqfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWQFJG = #{ywqfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GJDW = #{gjdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QFRQ = #{qfrq,jdbcType=DATE}, YXQZ = #{yxqz,jdbcType=DATE}, ZJSJRQ = #{zjsjrq,jdbcType=DATE}, MANAGE_UNIT = #{manageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABINET_NUM = #{cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGE_PLACE = #{storagePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAVE_STATUS = #{saveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DQZT = #{dqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_LOCK = #{isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE = #{exceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CABINET = #{isCabinet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT cf.* FROM cf_certificate cf LEFT JOIN oms_pri_apply opa ON cf.ZJHM = opa.PASSPORT_NUM WHERE cf.DQZT = 4 OR opa.REVERT_LICENCE_TIME <=NOW()
mapper.delete: UPDATE cf_certificate SET IS_VALID = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cf_certificate WHERE MANAGEUNIT != NULL OR MANAGEUNIT !=""
SELECT ID id, A0100 a0100 FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo WHERE IDNUMBER_GA = #{idNo} AND PY = #{namePY}
SELECT ID id, ZJLX zjlx, ZJHM zjhm, QFRQ qfrq FROM cf_certificate WHERE A0100 =#{a0100}
SELECT ID id, ID_TYPE idType, ID_NUMBER idNumber, OGE_DATE ogeDate, OGE_TIME ogeTime FROM oms_entryexit_record WHERE A0100 =#{a0100}

insert into cf_certificate (ID, IMPORT_TIME, IMPORT_PERSON, OMS_ID, A0100, A0184, NAME, PY, SEX, CSRQ, GJ, ZWCSDD, YWCSDD, ZJHM, ZJLX, ZJXS, LOCATION, ZWQFDD, YWQFDD, ZWQFJG, YWQFJG, GJDW, QFRQ, YXQZ, ZJSJRQ, MANAGE_UNIT, CABINET_NUM, STORAGE_PLACE, SAVE_STATUS, DQZT, IS_LOCK, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, IS_CABINET, UPDATE_TIME, IS_VALID) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.importPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.a0184,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.py,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.csrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zwcsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ywcsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.zjxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zwqfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ywqfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zwqfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ywqfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gjdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qfrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.yxqz,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.zjsjrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.manageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storagePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.saveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.exceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isCabinet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
